short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play random study music when you click the icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relaxing Study Music Player is the perfect companion for your focused work sessions, study time, or moments when you need to unwind. With a single click, you can start playing soothing, calming, and ambient music that helps you concentrate. Click the icon again to stop the music.

Key Features:
Random Music Playback: Automatically plays a random track from a collection of relaxing MP3s.
Simple to Use: Just click the icon in the toolbar to play or stop the music.
Loop Playback: The music will loop endlessly until you stop it, helping you maintain your focus for as long as you need.
Offline Support: Music is hosted and played directly from your extension, so no internet connection is needed once installed.
Whether you are studying, working, or simply need to relax, the Relaxing Study Music Player is a great tool to keep you calm and focused.
